chickenGPT:
**If 07/28/2024 is a holiday:**

On National Chick Medication Awareness Day, 🐸 reminded 🐥 to take his pills at 10 PM. 🐥, distracted by fireworks, forgot. 🐸 sighed, "Next time, don't let your feathers get in the way of your health!"

**If 07/28/2024 is not a holiday:**

"Hey, 🐥, it's 10 PM!" 🐸 croaked.
"Oh, I forgot!" 🐥 squeaked.
"Well, guess who's hopping mad?" 🐸 said, wagging his tongue.
🐥 giggled and took his medicine.
